infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: HS Managment App App requires access to your camera to let Capture Pictures to publish your Adds on HS Managment App
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: HS Managment App needs to access your camera roll to enable you to choose Pictures for your items
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: HS Managment App needs to access your camera roll so that you can upload Pictures to insert your items
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Your Location Is Used For Showing You The Nearest real estate items to you
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Your Location Is Used For Showing You The Nearest real estate items to you
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Your Location Is Used For Showing You The Nearest real estate items to you
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: Your Location Is Used For Showing You The Nearest real estate items to you
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
